CustomField.description:
Helps to prevent mistakenly adding data to outdated or irrelevant campaigns, ensuring cleaner data, reporting accuracy, and maintaining a clear view of active campaigns for ongoing marketing efforts.
In System Use: Flow - Campaign - Create Campaign Button
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Helps to prevent mistakenly adding data to outdated or irrelevant campaigns, ensuring cleaner data, reporting accuracy, and maintaining a clear view of active campaigns for ongoing marketing efforts.
